page.title: 02A School in 1985
page.content:
Our school has over 1200 students with many equal sized rooms used for education. In these there are rows of {desks,}at which students sit and work, in classes of about 30, writing what they learn on{paper.
Each subject has a group of classrooms in a particular part of the school. Every teacher teaches their subject using a black (or white) board at the front of the classroom.
Among the{subjects}taught are Maths, English, French, History, Religious Studies, Physical Education, Geography Music, Art, Chemistry, Biology and Physics.
Each class has a{tutor}who helps the children solve problems.
